title.rendered: Happy New Year From Search Berg!

content.rendered:
Team Search Berg would like to wish everyone a very happy, prosperous, joy-filled 2019!

2018 was an amazing year for us and we want to take this opportunity to thank our clients, affiliates, fans, vendors, white label partners, and the talented folks here at Search Labs for making 2018 a record breaking year for Search Berg.

Here are a few noteworthy mentions for 2018.

  • Successfully completed 15000 SEO projects
  • Ranked #1 Digital Marketing Agency by Clutch
  • Ranked in Top 10 Web Design Agency in New York by Upcity
  • Ranked in Top 15 Local SEO Companies in New York by Upcity

We are looking forward to the new year celebrations and some well-earned time off with family and friend! Once again thank you for supporting Search Berg.

See you in 24 hours, next year.
